articles.description: The star, who is stepmother to Rio's three children Tate, 13, Lorenz, 15, and Tia, 11, admitted that while she has always been 'welcomed', there are times when she gets 'over-emotional'.
articles.content:
Kate Ferdinand has candidly revealed that she can still feel like an 'outsider' in her blended family with her husband Rio.

articles.title: Oldham teenager's sunset mountain hare shot wins top RSPCA prize - BBC
articles.description: Ben Harrott, from Oldham, says it took a lot of patience to capture his photograph of a mountain hare.
articles.content:
A teenager's "almost abstract" photograph of a shy mountain hare lying in the winter sun has won the top prize at the RSPCA Young Photographer Awards.
